content: here s a little holiday gift for you for supporting my designs throughout this past year i look forward to creating more designs in 2023 when i was a child every winter my mother and grandmother would knit winter socks i think everyone knitted the same pattern in my village since everyone had similar looking socks i ve never knitted socks but decided that this year i would recreate the famous village socks therefore the name wishing everyone the best of holidays and health and happiness throughout the new year i hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting **note ** both village socks and wild village socks are in the same pdf file so it doesn t matter what socks page you download them from you will get the same two patterns **errata - 20/01/2023** a revised version of the pattern has been uploaded thank you user mamashields for spotting the error on page two of village socks in the third column last paragraph it should read as sl1 k9 instead of sl1 k10 **errata - 10/02/2023** a revised version of the pattern has been uploaded again because i corrected a typo
